original_text: Hiram put five of the carts on the south side of the temple. He put the other five carts on the north side of the temple. He put ‘the Sea’ on the south side of the temple, at the south-east corner.
korean_text: 그 받침 수레 다섯은 성전 오른쪽에 두었고 다섯은 성전 왼쪽에 두었고 성전 오른쪽 동남쪽에는 그 바다를 두었더라

sentences.original_text: Hiram put five of the carts
sentences.korean_translation: 히람은 수레 중 다섯 개를 놓았고

sentences.original_text: on the south side of the temple
He put the other five carts
on the north side of the temple
on the south side of the temple
